entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High 20. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of rain. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 16.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 in the morning. High 16. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
